name: 7DRL 2021
description:
My entry for the 2021 7DRL.  It's pretty slow in the browser, I will upload a standalone version later.  Give it a minute to load all the assets at the start screen, it just takes a minute.  It seems to work best in Edge or Chrome, NOT Firefox.

The Quitting a game or Restarting doesn't work in the browser, so refresh your page if you want to play again or restart.

  • WASD or Arrows to move
  • M - opens/closes the Map
  • I - opens/closes the Inventory 
  • P - Drinks a potion

Bump into enemies to attack, doors to open them or chests to open them (though the animation doesn't actually work, you will get the treasure).

Good Luck
